{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DCS-2230 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/06/2011 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=camera |fcc_id=KA2CS2230A1 |ic_id=4216A-CS2230A1 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F5608U0D-PCB0 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=CC&C WL-294 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CUS |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Full HD Cube Wireless Network Camera''
{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DCS-2230}} The flash ''appears'' to be a K9F5608U0D-PCB0 (32MB). "7465CD" is silkscreened on the main board. ==Images== File:DCS-2230 front.jpg|main [[Has images::external| ]] ==Probable used PSU(s)== The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a '''Global Yeou Diann Electric Industrial (AMIGO)''' AMS1-0501200FU. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=AMIGO |model=AMS1-0501200FU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.2 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1.2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |manuf_country=China |style=small, horiz. |e_level=5 }}
